reuters.title: U.S. SELLS 3-MO BILLS AT 6.84 PCT, STOP 6.90 PCT, 6-MO 7.21 PCT, STOP 7.25 PCT
reuters.body: Shr three cts vs two cts Net 456,000 vs 272,000 Sales 15 mln vs 14.4 mln Nine mths Shr six cts vs 23 cts Net 992,000 vs 3,812,000 Sales 41.1 mln vs 45.4 mln Order backlog 46 mln vs 24.3 mln Note: 1986 figures include a gain of 2.9 mln dlr or 17 cts a share from life insurance proceeds. Reuter 
